honk.gloss: eject the contents of the stomach through the mouth

hoodwink.gloss: conceal one's true motives from especially by elaborately feigning good intentions so as to gain an end

synonyms.word: pull the wool over someone's eyes

hop on.gloss: get up on the back of

hopple.gloss: strap the foreleg and hind leg together on each side (of a horse) in order to keep the legs on the same side moving in unison

horn in.gloss: search or inquire in a meddlesome way

house-train.gloss: train (a pet) to live cleanly in a house

housebreak.gloss: train (a pet) to live cleanly in a house

houseclean.gloss: clean and tidy up the house

hover.gloss: be suspended in the air, as if in defiance of gravity
hang over, as of something threatening, dark, or menacing

ho-hum.gloss: so lacking in interest as to cause mental weariness

hoarse.gloss: deep and harsh sounding as if from shouting or illness or emotion

hoary.gloss: showing characteristics of age, especially having grey or white hair
covered with fine whitish hairs or down

hogged.gloss: (of a ship) so weakened as to sag at each end

hole-and-corner.gloss: relating to the peripheral and unimportant aspects of life

hole-in-corner.gloss: relating to the peripheral and unimportant aspects of life

hollow-eyed.gloss: characteristic of the bony face of a cadaver

holographic.gloss: written entirely in one's own hand

holographical.gloss: written entirely in one's own hand

homely.gloss: lacking in physical beauty or proportion

homicidal.gloss: characteristic of or capable of or having a tendency toward killing another human being

homiletic.gloss: of the nature of a homily or sermon

homiletical.gloss: of the nature of a homily or sermon

hominian.gloss: characterizing the family Hominidae, which includes Homo sapiens as well as extinct species of manlike creatures

hominid.gloss: characterizing the family Hominidae, which includes Homo sapiens as well as extinct species of manlike creatures

homochromatic.gloss: (of light or other electromagnetic radiation) having only one wavelength

homocyclic.gloss: containing a closed ring of atoms of the same kind especially carbon atoms

homogeneous.gloss: all of the same or similar kind or nature

homogenised.gloss: formed by blending unlike elements especially by reducing one element to particles and dispersing them throughout another substance

homogenized.gloss: formed by blending unlike elements especially by reducing one element to particles and dispersing them throughout another substance

homogenous.gloss: all of the same or similar kind or nature

homologic.gloss: similar in evolutionary origin but not in function

homological.gloss: similar in evolutionary origin but not in function

homonymic.gloss: of or related to or being homonyms

homonymous.gloss: of or related to or being homonyms

homostyled.gloss: (botany) having styles all of the same length

homostylic.gloss: (botany) having styles all of the same length

homostylous.gloss: (botany) having styles all of the same length

honest.gloss: not disposed to cheat or defraud
gained or earned without cheating or stealing

honest-to-god.gloss: (used informally especially for emphasis) real or genuine

honest-to-goodness.gloss: (used informally especially for emphasis) real or genuine

honeycombed.gloss: pitted with cell-like cavities (as a honeycomb)

honorable.gloss: not disposed to cheat or defraud
adhering to ethical and moral principles

honourable.gloss: adhering to ethical and moral principles

hooked.gloss: curved down like an eagle's beak
having or resembling a hook (especially in the ability to grasp and hold)

hooklike.gloss: having or resembling a hook (especially in the ability to grasp and hold)

hornlike.gloss: made of horn (or of a substance resembling horn)

horny.gloss: made of horn (or of a substance resembling horn)

horrendous.gloss: causing fear or dread or terror

horrid.gloss: grossly offensive to decency or morality

horrific.gloss: grossly offensive to decency or morality

hostile.gloss: very unfavorable to life or growth

hot.gloss: characterized by violent and forceful activity or movement
producing a burning sensation on the taste nerves

hot and bothered.gloss: thrown into a state of agitated confusion

hotheaded.gloss: characterized by undue haste and lack of thought or deliberation

house-trained.gloss: (of pets) trained to urinate and defecate outside or in a special place

housebroken.gloss: (of pets) trained to urinate and defecate outside or in a special place

hoarsely.gloss: in a hoarse or husky voice

honestly.gloss: (used as intensives reflecting the speaker's attitude) it is sincerely the case that

however.gloss: despite anything to the contrary (usually preceding a concession)
